releases.name: Rockbox-Y1 v0.3 (iPod Theme Compatible) (Type B)
releases.body: # Rockbox-Y1 v0.3 | | | |:--:|:--:| _**Theme:** [Adwaitapod](https://github.com/rockbox-y1/themes/releases/download/for_the_gays_and_the_theys/adwaitapod_360p.zip) by [Dook](https://ko-fi.com/dook_)_ # Changelog A lot has happened since v0.2 and Rockbox on the Y1. If you are still running v0.2 you might want to consider updating. ## Major Changes - Dual Boot Stock OS/Rockbox - Type A & Type B support - use Type B if you have click wheel issues - 240p and 360p versions - Idle Poweroff, Timed Shutdown - Lyrics (lrc) support ## Improvements for Audiobooks ### Playback Speed Setting - WPS > hold Center button > Pitch - You might need to enable Timestretch in the Sound Settings first if you only see options for pitch, not speed ### Automatic Bookmarking - Enabling "Bookmark on Stop" - To stop press play 3-4 times - Or: use Timed Shutdown (General Settings > Startup/Shutdown > Start Sleep Timer) ## UI/UX - Accessibility: WPS voice announcements - Button combination to restart Rockbox if it got stuck - Enabled charging indicator - Enabled plugin to rearrange Main Menu (Plugins > Applications > main_menu_config) - Many button mapping improvements, e.g., for PictureFlow - Larger memory allocation for larger themes - App only starts when SD is ready, no Rockbox restarts necessary after copying files over or on initial boot - Battery optimizations (you may still need to recalibrate your battery after installation https://www.ifixit.com/Wiki/Battery_Calibration#Section_How_to_calibrate_your_battery) And many bug fixes and general UI/UX improvements. A big thanks to all the contributors on Github!

A big thanks to all the contributors on Github!
